BBS course is an undergraduate Business Management course. The full form of BBS is Bachelor of Business Studies.
BBS Course is designed to provide a basic understanding of Management education and to train the students in communication skills effectively which inculcate entrepreneurship skills.
BBS syllabus is very similar to BBAâ€™s, But its focus is majorly in practical exposure rather than a theoretical study.
Aspirants can specialize in management, accounting, marketing and information systems.
The BBS job scope is vast and it takes the industrial experience to its core and, certain institutions, it a part of the curriculum.
In this degree, various business courses are integrated with a realistic and industry-based focus in order to build sound business ideas within the aspirants.
Many colleges incorporate training and practical experience, in the form of case projects, presentations, internships, industrial visits, and interaction with experts from the industry as a part of the BBS course syllabus.
Some Colleges that offer this course are University of Delhi, Jamia Millia Islamia and Daly College of Business School.
